Text: Yeah, this seems a bit fishey to me.

My brother is actually the one hosting this, but I put it all together. It took months to make this work. I use it only to play Marvel Vs Capcom 2.  Works perfectly, I have an update coming too. I assure you, this is no virus.
Run a virus scanner on it if you think it's a virus, if it is let me know, but it's only 2K i'm sure you can spare the bandwith ;)
Actually, there was a problem in the compression, the files got messed up. I sent snail a new zipped folder, and it seems to work fine. Sorry about that.
